data.title: IBM SkillsBuild Cybersecurity Certificate
data.text:
We have partnered with IBM SkillsBuild to offer a new 60-65 hour, employer-verified credential designed to prepare community college learners for cybersecurity career exploration across multiple industry sectors.

This flexible online learning experience prepares learners through verified credentials, skills-based badges, an employer-led virtual experience, and a completion certificate. Skills-Based Badges: - Governance, Risk, Compliance, and Data Privacy; - Vulnerability Management; - System and Network Security; - Cloud Security; - Security Operations and Management; - Incident Response and Systems Forensics; - IBM SkillsBuild Cybersecurity Certificate. Workforce development funding may be available for learners through the TEC-P Grant. If you plan to work with a Workforce Development Center for funding, please contact them before registering.

Access to the learning management system and other onboarding details will be provided upon registration. Students will need to register with the college to get set up in Active Directory and MyCourses.

Dates: 6/7 - 8/18

Location: Online

Cost: $350
